job description:
Data Engineer x 4
? Master?s or Bachelor?s degree in Data Science, Computer Science, or Computer Engineering.
? Proven ability in data manipulation and database techniques to transform large and complex datasets
? Two plus years of experience with relational databases Microsoft SQL Server, SAP, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Hive, and HANA; experience with non-relational databases such as Cassandra, Mongo, and HBase a plus.
? Two years of experience with Big Data technologies including Hadoop, Spark, and Yarn required.
? Familiarity with python is required. Familiarity with the standard data science stack (numpy, scikit-learn, scipy, matplotlib, nltk, etc.) is a plus.
? Ability to function in Linux operating system and development environment
? Excellent oral and written communication skills essential
